TITLE: These are the best ways to give to charity for the 'vast majority of people.' Here's how to pick the most tax-efficient strategy
SUMMARY: If you're planning a charitable gift for 2022, here's how to decide on the most tax-efficient strategy.

TITLE: ‘The IRS is not the boogeyman.’ Here's what to do if you still can’t pay your taxes
SUMMARY: If you're wrestling with tax debt, you may have options like an installment agreement or a penalty abatement through the IRS. Here's what filers need to know.

TITLE: IRS erred on child tax credit payments for millions of eligible families — but aid was 98% accurate overall, report finds
SUMMARY: The IRS skipped advanced child tax credit payments for millions and mistakenly sent payments to filers who didn't qualify. But aid was 98% accurate overall.

TITLE: Mark Cuban started his first side hustle at age 12—here's his money advice for kids today
SUMMARY: Mark Cuban, who is now on his 13th season of ABC's "Shark Tank," says he still enjoys the show because it can inspire anyone to start a business. Even kids.

TITLE: 'We are not rich:' A couple share one money tip that lets them travel full time — on land and sea
SUMMARY: Samantha Khoo and Rene Sullivan sold their possessions in 2017 to travel full time. Here's why they're trading van life for a sailing lifestyle.

TITLE: Stock market losses wipe out $9 trillion from Americans' wealth
SUMMARY: Falling stock markets have wiped out $9 trillion in wealth from U.S. households, putting pressure on family balance sheets and spending.

TITLE: Going to Hong Kong? Get ready for a barrage of Covid tests
SUMMARY: Travelers no longer need to quarantine to visit Hong Kong, a move which spurred a surge in  interest to leave the city, but far less to visit.

TITLE: Christie's launches 'Department X' as collectible sneakers and street-wear boom
SUMMARY: Christie's announced its new "Department X" to capitalize on the booming market for collectible sneakers, streetwear and sports history.

TITLE: Mark Cuban says 25% of his ‘Shark Tank’ deals are flops: ‘What the hell was I thinking?’
SUMMARY: Mark Cuban has "no regrets" when it comes to his "Shark Tank" investing track record, even though he says roughly one in four of his deals turn into flops.

TITLE: Why Mark Cuban keeps working, even though he wanted to retire at 35: ‘I’m too competitive’
SUMMARY: At age 25, Mark Cuban thought he would retire within 10 years. He said the reason he's still working at age 64 is because he's competitive.

TITLE: Bond yields soar as markets weigh threat of a recession. What it means for your investments
SUMMARY: Government bond yields have soared after a major rate hike from the Federal Reserve. Here's what the inverted yield curve means for your portfolio.

TITLE: Inside the $250 million penthouse on 'Billionaires' Row'
SUMMARY: The penthouse in the world's tallest residential building is listed for $250 million, marking a major test of the ultra-luxury real estate market.

TITLE: Pairing up? Here’s how to know when it’s time to combine your finances
SUMMARY: If you're moving in with your partner, a joint bank account can make sense. But make sure you do a lot of thinking and discussing before you merge other assets.

TITLE: Nearly 6 in 10 donors may give more to charity despite economic fears, study finds
SUMMARY: Despite economic uncertainty, some donors may be eyeing bigger gifts for 2022, according to a study. Here's what investors need to know.

TITLE: Trip.com says China hotel bookings are surpassing pre-pandemic levels
SUMMARY: That growth came despite continued sporadic lockdowns and travel restrictions across China to control Covid outbreaks.

TITLE: The most common crime in UK hotels isn't theft
SUMMARY: Freedom of information requests to U.K. police forces reveal the types of crime most prevalent in hotels.

TITLE: Benchmark bond yields are ‘bad news' for investors as the Fed hikes rates by 0.75%. What it means for your portfolio
SUMMARY: An inverted yield curve between the 2-year and 10-year Treasurys may signal a future economic downturn. Here's what investors need to know.

TITLE: Mark Zuckerberg: The metaverse will unfold in 3 steps, and one is happening ‘sooner than I thought'
SUMMARY: On Joe Rogan's podcast, Mark Zuckerberg said virtual fitness platforms are already drawing everyday users into the metaverse.

TITLE: Some millennials and Gen Zers are closing investing accounts over inflation. Here's why that may lead to regrets
SUMMARY: Some consumers are closing investment accounts amid inflation and volatility concerns, a survey found. Here's why that may be a mistake.

TITLE: Millionaire shares 4 'unpopular money rules' that made him rich: 'Don't buy anything you can lease'
SUMMARY: Many people know how to earn money, but few know how to spend it, says self-made millionaire Grant Cardone. He shares the "unpopular" money rules that helped him save enough money to build a thriving real estate empire and buy a house with cash.

SUMMARY: Billionaire founder Jared Isaacman is deep into training for the first launch of the Polaris Program, in partnership with Elon Musk's SpaceX.

TITLE: Billionaire Lukas Walton’s family office accelerates impact-investing push
SUMMARY: Chicago-based Builders Vision will announce today that its Builders Initiative Foundation has moved 90% of its endowment into "mission-related" investments.

TITLE: You can visit Bhutan again — if you're willing to cough up $200 a day in fees
SUMMARY: Bhutan hikes its Sustainable Development Fee from $65 to $200 in a controversial move that the country says will benefit locals and travelers alike.

TITLE: The extended tax deadline is fast approaching for 19 million Americans. What to know if you still haven't filed
SUMMARY: The tax deadline extension is Oct. 17. Here's how to get organized if you still haven't filed your return.

TITLE: Mark Cuban fires business partners and NBA players for the same reason: 'A team can have 1 knucklehead, you can't have 2'
SUMMARY: Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban said he's fired business partners and traded athletes based on how they contribute to workplace or team culture. Here's why.

TITLE: Michael Jordan's 'Last Dance' jersey sells for record-breaking $10.1 million
SUMMARY: A jersey worn by Michael Jordan in the first game of the 1998 NBA Finals sold for $10.1 million at Sotheby's on Thursday.

TITLE: Here's how to calculate your bill for student loan forgiveness, if you live in one of the 7 states that may tax it
SUMMARY: If you're living in a state that may tax student loan forgiveness, experts suggest setting money aside. Here's how to calculate your liability.

TITLE: Corgis, castles and handbags: What happens to Queen’s wealth after her death?
SUMMARY: After Queen Elizabeth II passed away, questions about how wealthy she really was and what will happen with her assets now have been raised.

TITLE: A purchase at a small town sale turned out to be a 'priceless' de Kooning painting stolen in 1985
SUMMARY: Experts at the Getty spent three years repairing "Woman-Ochre," a painting by Willem de Kooning that was stolen from The University of Arizona Museum of Art.
